contents.sentence: When test results for mixture properties or density exceed the allowable tolerances, were adjustment points applied? (Note that the adjustment points will be used to calculate a quality assurance adjustment quantity, q, for the lot.)
To apply the results of inspection to payment.
i. When test results for the mixture furnished exceeded the allowable tolerances, adjustment points were assessed as the following:
ii. When test results for the mixture furnished exceed the allowable range, adjustment points were assessed as the following:
